item.title: The Psychology of Money [Morgan Housel]
item.description: The Psychology of Money. Morgan Housel. The Collaborative Fund. http://www.collaborativefund.com/blog/the-psychology-of-money/. 2018-06-01. Luck and risk are different sides of the same coin. People underestimate the role of luck and risk. There are a billion investors. By sheer chance, we expect a couple of them to be billionaires predominantly off luck. But it's hard to point fingers after the fact. Some people are born into families that encourage education; others are against it.
